name: Return of Officer Tape
description:
3023 year. Planet October. City of Tape Land.

You are a former policeman who is tired of facing the lawlessness of the laws established by the authorities.

After a series of terrorist attacks committed by you, the government arranged for you a real bounty hunt.

All you have is a lightsaber, a love of soda, and a belief in tape. Can you escape and survive?

The game has begun...

This game was created for Mini Jame Gam #16. It's my first experience for real game development. I think I got it cool for the first time. Wait any feedback.

I want say special thanks my gf for playtesting my game <3

P.S. In web version on Gamepad doesn't work RT, so you can use Xbox X
